markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skittering Sneak](/Feats.aspx?ID=5669) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth. You can move up to your full Speed when you [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405).
name: Skittering Sneak
